Aerys Targaryen (disambiguation)027429h2rdjj1jyepdbzh18hihqw44urj89rn1542542014-07-22T00:45:31ZThe Dragon Demands5014364{{disambig|Targaryen, Aerys}}
'''Aerys Targaryen''' may refer to:
#King [[Aerys I Targaryen]], second son of King [[Daeron I Targaryen]], who due directly succeeded his father on the throne after the untimely death of his older brother, Baelor Breakspear. Died childless, and the throne passed to his brother Maekar, grandfather of the later Aerys II. Aerys I was thus the great-uncle of Aerys II.
#King [[Aerys II Targaryen]], commonly remembered as "the Mad King". Father of Rhaegar, Viserys, and Daenerys. Son of King Aegon V, himself the son of King Maekar, and thus the great-nephew of King Aerys I.
[[Category:Disambiguations]]
